entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
